trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The user-supplied `state` parameter is the object passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method that identifies the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 用户提供`state`参数是将对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>标识异步写入操作的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the scope of the progress changed event such as for an entire multiple document sequence, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，指定的进度范围更改事件类似于针对整个多文档序列、 单个文档或单个页。

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope defined by `writingLevel`, the number of documents or the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 根据定义的范围`writingLevel`，文档或都已写入的页面数的数目。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of data that has been written.
trans-unit.target: 已写入的数据的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The user-supplied object that identifies the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 标识写操作的用户提供的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档或都已写入的页的数目。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>, Number specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>，数字指定的已写入的文档数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, Number is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情况下，数是都已写入的页面数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages that have been written at the time of the event.
trans-unit.target: 文档或页的事件时都已写入数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the writing progress.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示写入进度的作用域。

trans-unit.source: When the WritingLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 当 WritingLevel 属性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>属性指定的已写入的文档数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>

trans-unit.source: For all other WritingLevel cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他 WritingLevel 情况，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>属性为已写入的页数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of writing a multiple document sequence, a single document, or single page.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值，该值指示编写多个文档序列、 单个文档或单页的作用域。
